original_text: They did work wilily, and went and made as if they had been ambassadors, and took old sacks upon their asses, and wine bottles, old, and rent, and bound up;
korean_text: 꾀를 내어 사신의 모양을 꾸미되 해어진 전대와 해어지고 찢어져서 기운 가죽 포도주 부대를 나귀에 싣고

sentences.original_text: and went and made as if they had been ambassadors
and took old sacks upon their asses
and wine bottles, old, and rent
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 낡고 찢어진 가죽 부대를 가져왔으며
